casebody.data:
No. 10-114. Ricky D. Fox, Petitioner v. Billy Ray Vice, Chief of Police for the Town of Vinton, et al. 562 U.S. 1002, 131 S. Ct. 505,

178 L. Ed. 2d 369,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8502. November 1, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit granted.

Same case below, 594 F.3d 423.
